**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================================================================

**Title**: W6862-220125 Heavy Equipment with Operator Standing Offer

**Reference Number**: WS3814262485-Doc3820067250

**Publication Date**: February 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: March 15, 2023 at 14:00:00

**Amendment Date**: March 7, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified

**Expected Contract End Date**: February 5, 2026

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Supply Description**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a standing offer for the provision of heavy equipment and competent operators to perform various tasks at Canadian Forces Base, Lazo, BC, Seal Bay Armoury, and HMCS Quadra. The services will be required on an "as and when required" basis.

**Key Requirements**
--------------------

* Supply all necessary labour, materials, equipment, and supervision
* Provide heavy equipment and competent operators to perform tasks at specified locations
* Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Reliable Status
* Meet Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) requirements

**Estimated Value**
------------------

The total expenditure of the standing offer for the three-year period is expected to be $500,000 (including GST/HST).

**Contract Details**
---------------------

* Standing offer period: 3 years
* Two irrevocable options to extend the term for an additional 12 months each
* Contract will be issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* Interested suppliers must submit their responses to the standing offer through the Ariba platform
* Contact information:
  * Lana Hunt (elle-la / she-her)
  * Email: [lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  * Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15346720?extsite=MTUzNDY3MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
